title: Person Name

alternative.description: Another name that the person is known by. This might be an alias, a nickname or a name that the person is also known as (aka).

fullNameAlternative.description: The full name of the person

firstNameAlternative.description: The first segment of the full name

givenNamesAlternative.description: The parts of the full name that preceed the last name

lastNameAlternative.description: The last segment of the full name

middleInitialsAlternative.description: First initials of the middle names, without periods, separated by spaces

middleNamesAlternative.description: Middle or additional names supplied between the First name and Last name, separated by spaces

suffixAlternative.description: A group of letters provided after a person’s name to provide additional information (such as Jr., Sr., M.D., PhD, I, II, III, and so on)

titleAlternative.description: An abbreviation of a person’s title, honorific, or salutation (such as Mr., Ms., or Dr.).
